description: Just doing some shameless self promo because I’m in desperate need of motivation and validations. This is a re-imagining of the brilliant work “When It Rains It Pours” by wordsongs. There are many trigger warnings in the tags, and so please proceed with caution.

reblog.comment: Just doing some shameless self promo because I’m in desperate need of motivation and validations. This is a re-imagining of the brilliant work “When It Rains It Pours” by wordsongs. There are many trigger warnings in the tags, and so please proceed with caution.

A magazine that is published monthly by members of the Phandom. This is meant to keep everyone up to date as to what is going on within the world of Dan and Phil and their "phans".

View All the Magazines | Meet the Admins

body:
Please Don’t Stop Writing Phanfics….

A message to all Phanfic writers out here.

Please don’t stop writing.

I am being pathetic over lack of DnP collabs this year.

I am glad though that Phil is back and seems to be more open and sassy. But I also want Dan to be back as well…

I mean the problem is, that unlike many Phannies I joined the Phandom on 2018. I am now sad that I might have been too late lol . I am now watching their old vids and fearing this is all we will have.

I am reading through shit load of Phanfics though. Keep em coming please everybody!!!

I see my cousins writing Larrie fics even today for God’s sake. Even though am not into Larrie Stylinson at all lol I checked AO3 it’s still alive and going strong! Even though Larrie has been debunked!

I have heard all sorts of theories that DnP have moved apart, Dan has left YT etc. As a fan I respect that decision. I wish DnP nothing but happiness in whatever they do or choose to be.

But still Dan’s hiatus has saddened me. Phanfics are the only medication the doc ordered.

So write more epic Phanfics. Give Misfits a competition! Oneshots, Chaptered , etc . bring in the fics!

Just like Phancollabs……

There’s no such thing as enough Phanfics.

title: mon cheri
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VPfjAo

by panicked_introvert

Phil Lester thought his life would be nothing but perfect after confessing his feelings to Dan Howell. But when Phil’s best friend experiences serious injuries, a criminal mastermind attempts to steal the Venus de Milo in Paris, and his relationship with Dan starts to become strained, Phil realises that things are far from perfect, and that his entire life could crumble apart just like that.

Words: 3118, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Blow A Kiss AU

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester, Tyler Oakley, Original Characters, Brendon Urie
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester, Phil Lester & Tyler Oakley
  • Additional Tags: Boyfriends, Spies & Secret Agents, Mission Fic, Undercover as a Couple, Forehead Kisses, Morning Kisses, Injury, Major Character Injury, Blood


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VPfjAo

reblog.comment:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VPfjAo

by panicked_introvert

Phil Lester thought his life would be nothing but perfect after confessing his feelings to Dan Howell. But when Phil’s best friend experiences serious injuries, a criminal mastermind attempts to steal the Venus de Milo in Paris, and his relationship with Dan starts to become strained, Phil realises that things are far from perfect, and that his entire life could crumble apart just like that.
